title: How old is Timothée Chalamet? - Quora
tags: Actors and Actresses of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Timothée Hal Chalamet is a talented American actor. He started his acting career in short movies, before showing up in the TV dramatization arrangement Homeland in 2012. He was born on 27 December 1995 in Manhattan, New York, United States. Presently, he is ongoing 25 years as in 2020.
